NL Question: Find the genre name associated with the movie 'New Year\'s Eve'.
Cypher: MATCH (m:Movie {title: "New Year's Eve"})-[:HAS]->(g:Genre) RETURN g.name AS GenreName;

NL Question: Find the number of times the user with first name 'Hilda' and last name 'Sutliff' watched the movie 'Angelique\'s Isle'.
Cypher: MATCH (u:User {firstName: 'Hilda', lastName: 'Sutliff'})-[r:WATCHED]->(m:Movie {title: "Angelique's Isle"}) RETURN r.watchCount AS WatchCount;
